auth.accountInactiveText: Your account has not yet been activated. This means that the functionality of the service is not yet available to you. We look forward to seeing you use it soon! If you want to speed up the activation process, we recommend contacting your organization's representatives.
auth.invalidLinkText: Oops! It appears that the registration link is incorrect or has expired. To obtain the correct link, please contact representatives of your organization for assistance.
auth.loginText: If you don't have an account yet, please contact representatives of your organization to obtain access to the platform.
auth.minUpperCase: At least {{value}} letter in upper case
auth.name: First name
